overview: After uncle Cao became a fairy, there was a resentment that he went to heaven. They found that the resentment was caused by the corpse demon king transformed by his brother Cao Jingzhi. In a battle,  Uncle Cao sacrificed himself for his younger brother and the Demon King was enlightened, and Uncle Cao was reborn as the Eight Immortals.
title: Eight Immortals of Cao Guo Jiu Ming Yuan
